description.narrative: Provide livelihood support, asset creation and climate adaptation activities, including capacity strengthening, to targeted farmers and communities.

sector.narrative: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

title.narrative: Volume (m3) of water harvesting systems rehabilitated
Number of new animal diptanks constructed
Number of women-headed households that receive food assistance
Number of boreholes for agriculture or livestock created
Number of social infrastructures and Income Generating infrastructures rehabilitated (School Building, Facility Center, Community Building, Market Stalls, etc.)
Number of participants in beneficiary training sessions (community preparedness, early warning, disaster risk reduction, and climate change adaptation)
Hectares (ha) of land brought under plantation
Number of non-food items distributed (tools, milling machines, pumps, etc.)
Number of assets built, restored or maintained by targeted communities
Number of participants in beneficiary training sessions (livelihood-support/agriculture&farming/IGA)
Number of culverts and drainage systems built (between 4-6m in width)
Number of fuel efficient stoves distributed
Hectares (ha) of agricultural land benefiting from rehabilitated irrigation schemes (including irrigation canal repair, specific protection measures, embankments, etc)
Length (m) of drainage canals constructed / rehabilitated
